answers.answer: My doctor just prescribed me some medicine for my headaches because there isn't much you can do while pregnant or take

Is high blood pressure bad? I mean I know itsnot good but I'M scared now!! I don't want anything to be wrong I mean I know my baby is okay cause I feel him moveing around in my belly but I can't help but be scared!!:(

I've had a headache for almost 3 weeks noe, unfortunately there isn't much they can do. They had me come in after the left side of my face went tingly and numb, but they just wanted to check my blood pressure and urine. Headaches can be a sign of pre ecclampsia,  so they were monitoring for that.
If you have high BP they will want to monitor you and check your urine to make sure you don't have preeclampsia... The beat thing to do is try to relax
What is preclampsia?? Sorry u spelled it wrong

They're just being cautious, you're most likely just experiencing a pregnancy headache. Just relax and know they're taking care of you and not blowing you off, which is nice. Headaches are very common in pregnancy.

I spelled it correctly, preeclampsia is a condition where your BP increases and you have protein in your urine. If not monitored correctly it can develop into eclampsia where you will have seizures and it can be quite fatal

Okay thank you and I'M glad they aren't blowing Me off like my last doctor! But I'M just scared I mean I've only had two bad headaches this pregnancy and every time I go in the take urine and they never said anything go about preeclampsia or whatever it is do you think if I had it they would hve said somethimg?

You can't technically develop preeclampsia before 20 weeks. That's part of how it is defined. So previously they were probably just keep an eye on everything. When you go today you may discuss it. There are several reasons you could be getting headaches though, dehydration is another one.

Okay and yesterday I did baby sit all day and didn't get time for myself so I didn't drink much water plus I was so tired I couldn't keep my eyes open I think it's from being over tired and not drink Enough water maybe??
That could definitely be it. That's why you get hangovers lol. They are a combination of lack of sleep and dehydration. Make sure you drink plenty today.
Okay thank you! You really made me feel so much better!

question: So I called my doctor to tell him that my head ache that I've had since like 7:30 this morning isn't going away and he said that he wants me to come in today at 2 to get looked at! Could it be bad?? Im 20 weeks 6 days
title: something bad???:(
